element.short: Logical URI to reference this message definition (globally unique)
element.definition: An absolute URI that is used to identify this message definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this message definition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the message definition. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions).
element.comment: Can be a urn:uuid: or a urn:oid:, but real http: addresses are preferred.  Multiple instances may share the same url if they have a distinct version.
element.requirements: Allows the message definition to be referenced by a single globally unique identifier.
